unnormalised: My grandmother, Amma, swears by Ayurveda. She goes to a clinic near Kottayam every monsoon for rejuvenation. Last year, after Onam, she felt really drained and the treatments, especially the shirodhara, helped immensely. Says her joint pain (from walking 2 km daily!) vanished. It costs around Rs. 5000 for a week, but she says it's worth it for her health! She even makes special Ayurvedic biryani sometimes!
